document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of the cicadas (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) of Hainan Island, China, with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of the cicadas (Hemiptera: Cicadidae) of Hainan Island, China, with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Leptopsaltria sakaii Matsumura, 1913 : 75
.

Leptosemia sakaii : Matsumura, 1917 : 196
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 213 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 41 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 b: 361 .
Distribution. China (Hainan, Guangdong, Sichuan, Hubei, Jiangxi, Zhejiang and Taiwan ) (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Chou et al. , 1997 ).

Remarks. This species was recorded from Mt. Jianfengling of Hainan by Chen & Zheng ( 2000 ). The record of this species from Japan by Chou et al. ( 1997 ) could not be confirmed, and is not supported by other publications (e.g. Hayashi & Saisho, 2011 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 b).

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Limushan, light strap,
26 .v. 1984
, coll. Gu Maobin (NWAFU) Distribution. China (Hainan).

Remarks. This species is very similar to
L. sakaii
but differs in body size and male genitalia.

24 .
Purana guttularis (Walker, 1858 )
Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♀, Mt. Jianfengling,
24 .vii. 1984
, coll. Long Jianguo (SYSU).
Distribution. China (Hainan and Guangdong), Philippines , Indonesia , Vietnam , Malaysia , Thailand , Myanmar and India (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Pham & Yang, 2009 ; Sanborn et al ., 2007 ).

Chremistica nana Chen, 1943 : 27
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 267 .

Material examined. Hainan: 4 ♂♂ 2 ♀♀, Jianfeng, 170 m , light trap,
17 .vii. 2009
, coll. Gao Xia & Wang Shuye (NWAFU); 2 ♂♂, Mt. Jianfengling, 950 m , light trap,
22 .vii. 2009
, coll. Gao Xia (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Qixianling, 130 m ,
2 .v. 2008
, coll. Zheng Jianwu (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt. Bawangling, 138 m ,
27 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU);
1 ♂
, Mt, Wuzhishan, 340 m ,
5 .viii. 1960
, coll. unknown (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan).

Fidicina ochracea Walker, 1850 : 99
.

Chremistica ochracea : Schmidt, 1932 : 118
; Duffels & van der Laan, 1985 : 59 ; Chou et al. , 1997 : 266 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 41 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a: 161 ; Sanborn, Phillips & Sites, 2007 : 7 .
Distribution. China (Hainan, Guangxi, Guangdong, Fujian and Taiwan ), Thailand , Malaysia and India (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Chou et al. , 1997 ; Sanborn et al. , 2007 ).

27 .
Chremistica longa Lei, Chou
&
Li, 1995

Chremistica longa Lei, Chou
& Li, 1995 : 236 ; Chou et al. , 1997 : 272 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
1 ♀, Yinggen, 200 m ,
8 .vii. 1960
, coll. Li Changqing (NWAFU). Distribution. China (Hainan).

Cryptotympana holsti Distant, 1904 a: 331
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 277 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 41 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a: 166 ; Lee, 2008 : 5 ; Lee, 2010 a: 21 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
1 ♀, Mt. Jianfengling, 960 m , light trap,
28 .v. 2011
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Limushan, 220 m ,
14 .viii. 2009
, coll. Wang Shuye & Gaoxia (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan, Sichuan, Guizhou, Yunnan, Guangxi, Guangdong, Hongkong , Fujian, Hunan and Taiwan ), Vietnam , Laos and Cambodia (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Chou et al. , 1997 ; Lee, 2010 a).

Cryptotympana mandarina Distant, 1891 : 86
; Chou et al. , 1997 : 279 ; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 41 ; Lee, 2008 : 5 ; Lee, 2010 a: 21 .

Material examined. Hainan:
1 ♂
, Mt. Jianfengling,
6 .v. 1983
, coll. Gu Maobin (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Changjiang,
10 .v. 1984
, coll. Liu Yuanfu (NWAFU); 1 ♀, Mt. Diaoluoshan, 923 m ,
18 .viii. 2010
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan, Fujian, Guangxi, Hunan, Sichuan, Guizhou and Guangdong), Vietnam , Laos , Cambodia , Thailand and Myanmar (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Lee, 2010 a).

Fidicina recta Walker, 1850 : 79
.

Cryptotympana recta : Jacobi, 1905 : 431
; Hayashi, 1987 : 191 ; Chou et al. , 1997 : 280 ; Sanborn, Phillips & Sites, 2007 : 9 ; Lee, 2008 : 5 ; Lee, 2010 a: 21 .

Material examined. Hainan: 4 ♂♂ 2 ♀♀, Jianfeng, 170 m , light trap,
22 .vii. 2010
, coll. Yang Mingsheng (NWAFU).
Distribution. China (Hainan and Guangxi), Vietnam , Laos , Cambodia , Thailand , Bangladesh and India (Chou et al. , 1997 ; Lee, 2010 a).
Remarks. This species is newly recorded from Hainan.

Tettigonia atrata Fabricius, 1775 : 681
.

Cryptotympana atrata : Chou et al. , 1997 : 276
; Chen & Zheng, 2000 : 41 ; Lee & Hayashi, 2003 a: 163 ; Lee, 2008 : 5 ; Hayashi & Saisho, 2011 : 84 .
Distribution. Most provinces of China (including Hainan and Taiwan ), Korea , Japan and Indochina Peninsula (northern part) (Chen & Zheng, 2000 ; Chou et al. , 1997 ; Lee, 2008 ).
Remarks. This species was recorded from Danzhou and Lingao of Hainan by Chen & Zheng ( 2000 ).
